tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,
review: My child gave birth renova nilema hospital, after birth he didnt cried they have taken care very well after one day he got seizures continues for 3 days after that day by day he got seizures doctor explained day to day progress and condition we were worried but doctor supported us and treated very well we have taken second opinion from rainbow hospital and some of my frnds(doctors) i always recommend surya sir for child treatments.

We have Consulted the Doctor for our Baby Checkup and doctor listened every doubt we have and provided the clarifications for each and everything.
There is no rush in taking next patient , instead he keeps listening to our queries and after all our doubts are being clarified then only he starts looking into other patients. 

We are very happy with the Doctor's behaviour towards the child and also parents. Will definitely recommend the doctor to my near and dear.

** ***** ******* ***** ** * **** **** ******. He explains very clearly and the treatment is 100 percent.we went to this doctor  when our kid fallen from first floor  and the treatment given by this doctor is awesome*** *** **** **** ****** ** *** ***.I refer every parent to consult with this doctor if there kids face any health problems.
